verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm of David, <S%H1732><s%> to bring to remembrance. <S%H2142><s%> Make haste, O God, <S%H430><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me; make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> that seek after <S%H1245><s%> my soul: <S%H5315><s%> let them be turned <S%H5472><s%> backward, <S%H268><s%> and put to confusion, <S%H3637><s%> that desire <S%H2655><s%> my hurt. <S%H7451><s%>
Let them be turned back <S%H7725><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> a reward <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> that say, <S%H559><s%> Aha, <S%H1889><s%> aha. <S%H1889><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> those that seek <S%H1245><s%> thee rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in thee: and let such as love <S%H157><s%> thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> Let God <S%H430><s%> be magnified. <S%H1431><s%>

But I <S%H589><s%> am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy: <S%H34><s%> make haste <S%H2363><s%> unto me, O God: <S%H430><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my help <S%H5828><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> make no <S%H408><s%> tarrying. <S%H309><s%>
